description:
Effortless inner-city living beckons at the award-winning Verve Residences with this sleek 5th floor apartment. Enjoying a north-east facing aspect, sophisticated interiors are accentuated by 2.7m ceilings to enhance its sense of space. An open-concept layout awaits too, with the living and dining zone inviting in sunshine via floor-to-ceiling windows and doors, while the adjoining gourmet kitchen will inspire your inner chef. Why not take your feast onto the balcony for an alfresco dinner overlooking the cityscape?

Both bedrooms feature built-in robes and quality wool blend carpets for cosy comfort, with the main bedroom appointed with an ensuite. A second modern bathroom services bedroom two, plus the air-conditioned apartment offers an internal laundry and one undercover car space with storage. Verve Residences also benefits from visitor intercom and swipe level access, two high-speed lifts, concierge service and a private landscaped garden on level 3.

Positioned in an exciting and evolving precinct, you’ll have a front row seat to vibrant King Street. Whether you're looking to shop, dine, enjoy some drinks or explore the city's culture, it offers something for everyone. Marketown Shopping Centre is also on your doorstep, or head harbourside, where you can meander the attractive promenades that stretch from the Wickham Marina through Honeysuckle, connecting to Nobbys Beach. Plus, leave the car at home with a plethora of public transport ready to whisk you wherever you need.


Take the first step towards your new inner-city lifestyle at Verve Residences – arrange an inspection today.


Property Specifications:
- Sleek and stylish 2 bed, 2 bath apartment in the award-winning Verve Residences
- North-east facing and nestled on the 5th floor
- Sophisticated interiors, accentuated by 2.7m ceilings and an open-plan layout
- Gourmet kitchen with stone benches and island, Miele appliances, plumbed fridge space and pull-out pantry

- Living and dining zone trimmed by floor-to-ceiling commercial-grade double-glazed windows

- Both bedrooms fitted with built-in robes and quality wool blend carpets
- Two modern bathrooms, with one acting as an ensuite to the main
- 13m2 deck with views across the cityscape
- Air conditioning, ceiling fans and an internal laundry with clothes dryer
- 1 undercover car space with storage
- Security building with visitor intercom and swipe level access
- 2 high-speed lifts and private landscaped garden on level 3

- Concierge service available 8am to 6pm Monday - Friday and 8am to 1pm Saturday
- A desirable choice when seeking an effortless inner-city lifestyle
- Located on vibrant King St, footsteps from shopping, dining, nightlife and the city's culture
- Easy stroll to Marketown Shopping Centre, iconic Honeysuckle promenade and golden beaches
- Plethora of public transport on your doorstep
- Outgoings: Water - $715.38 pa approx. + usage, Council - $1,354.53 pa approx., Strata - $5,146.51 pa approx.

(We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations.)
